item.title: New postdoctoral fellowship program to accelerate innovation in health care
item.description:
麻省理工学院健康与生命科学合作计划（MIT HEALS）推出了Biswas博士后奖学金计划，旨在通过资助优秀的早期研究人员，应用前沿研究改善卫生保健和数百万人的生活。该计划将支持卓越的博士后研究人员在人类健康护理创新方面的工作，如在健康相关研究中利用人工智能，开发低成本诊断，以及将生命科学与经济学、商业、政策或人文学科结合等。该计划将通过为未来四年的每年颁发五个为期四年的奖学金来支持这些研究人员。

原文链接： https://news.mit.edu/2025/new-postdoctoral-fellowship-program-accelerate-innovation-health-care-0707

原文摘要：

The MIT Health and Life Sciences Collaborative (MIT HEALS) is launching the Biswas Postdoctoral Fellowship Program to advance the work of outstanding early-career researchers in health and life sciences. Supported by a gift from the Biswas Family Foundation, the program aims to help apply cutting-edge research to improve health care and the lives of millions.

The program will support exceptional postdocs dedicated to innovation in human health care through a full range of pathways, such as leve…
